description:
exp/template/html: change transition functions to return indices

Formulaic changes to transition functions in preparation for CL 5074041.
This should be completely semantics preserving.

messages.text:
Hello nigeltao@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5091041/diff/7001/src/pkg/exp/template/html/transition.go
File src/pkg/exp/template/html/transition.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5091041/diff/7001/src/pkg/exp/template/html/transition.go#newcode396
src/pkg/exp/template/html/transition.go:396: // recognised separately by the lexical grammar and becomes part
On 2011/09/20 03:40:02, nigeltao wrote:
> I'd use american spelling: s/recognised/recognized/.

Done.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b9195358cc18 ***

exp/template/html: change transition functions to return indices

Formulaic changes to transition functions in preparation for CL 5074041.
This should be completely semantics preserving.

LGTM.
